name: Home Seam Home
description:
In this game you are a little spider who travels in the attic of a house. Watch out for other hostile insects on your way !

Home Seam Home is a Global Game Jam 2019 project.
The team is composed by : 
Dev : Pierre Noel
Graphist : Robin "NoNameNoSocks" Hermann  & Pauline "Kinseis" Grassi
Music : Boris "GrizzlyCogs" Warembourg
Game Design : Adrien Bariau
